Ingredients: 0.5 lb chicken or turkey (ground or shredded)
Recipe Steps: Poke a line in the center of squash with a fork, microwave for 3-4 minutes to soften.
Slice squash in half, remove seeds and fibers, place in a baking dish, brush with olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and bake at 400°F for 30-40 minutes.
In a frying pan, melt butter and sauté garlic, add meat to cook.
Reduce heat, add cream, cream cheese, Parmesan, and ⅔ of the mozzarella, simmer until creamy, season with spices.
Remove squash from oven, increase oven temperature to 450°F.
Loosen squash flesh with a fork, press down, top with cream sauce and remaining mozzarella, bake for 5 minutes.
